node.context:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN"
  "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> 
<html>

<head>
    <title>[% $$NODE{title}; %]@Everything2.com</title>
    <style>
.oddrow {
    background-color: [%
$$VARS{ekw_oddrowcolor} || $$THEME{oddRowColor} || "#cccc99";
%];
}

.evenrow {
    background-color: [%
$$VARS{ekw_bgcolor} || $$THEME{bodyBgcolor} || "#ffffff";
%];
}

tt, pre, code {
    font-family: [% 
$$VARS{ekw_monofont} || $$THEME{monoFont} || "Courier New, monospace"; 
%];
    font-size: [% 
$$VARS{ekw_monofontsize} || $$THEME{monoFontSize} || "9pt"; 
%];
}

body, p, td, th, .time {
    font-family: [%
$$VARS{ekw_textfont} || $$THEME{textFont} || "arial, helvetica, serif";
%];
    font-size: [%
$$VARS{ekw_textfontsize} || $$THEME{textFontSize} || "12px";
%];
}

h1, h2, h3, h4 {
    font-family: [%
$$VARS{ekw_headingfont} || $$THEME{headingFont} || "Tahoma,Verdana,Helvetica,Arial";
%];
}


h1.topic {
    font-family: [%
$$VARS{ekw_textfont} || $$THEME{textFont} || "arial, helvetica, serif";
%];
    font-size: 80%;
    text-indent: 10px;
}

h2.topic {
    font-family: [%
$$VARS{ekw_textfont} || $$THEME{textFont} || "arial, helvetica, serif";
%];
    font-size: [%
$$VARS{ekw_textfontsize} || $$THEME{textFontSize} || "12px";
%];
    text-indent: 30px;
}

.time {
    align: right;
}

.rightmenu {
    text-indent: 10px;
}

.newwrite {
    margin-left: 3px;
}

p.ekwlogo {
    font-family: [%
$$VARS{ekw_logofont} || $$THEME{logoFont} || "Verdana,Tahoma,Helvetica,Arial";
%];
    font-size: [%
$$VARS{ekw_logofontsize} || $$THEME{logoFontSize} || "17pt";
%];
    font-weight: bold;
    border: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
}

h1, h2, h3 {
    font-family: [%
$$VARS{ekw_headingfont} || $$THEME{headingFont} || "Verdana,Tahoma,Helvetica,Arial";
%];
}

h1 {
    font-size: 13pt;
}

h1.nodetitle {
    font-size: 13pt;
}

h2 {
    font-size: 12pt;
}

h3 {
    font-size: 11pt;
}

small {
    font-size: 75%;
}

big {
    font-size: 110%;
}
</style>
    <link rel='stylesheet' id='basesheet' type='text/css' href='/node/stylesheet/basesheet?displaytype=view'>
    <meta name="wisdom" content="Monkey! Bat! Robot Hat!" />
    <link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" /><!-- Both are needed - asc -->
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" /><!-- Thanks Simpleton -->
    <link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Everything2 New Writeups" href="?node=New%20Writeups%20Atom%20Feed&type=ticker" />
[{static javascript}] 
[{googleanalytics}]
</head>

[{ekw userbody}]
CONTAINED_STUFF
</body>
</html>
node.title: ekw stdcontainer
